alert.note: Alert for Southern Hidalgo (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 3:14PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hidalgo County through 400 PM CDT... At 313 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sylvia Vela Park, or over Palmhurst, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edinburg, Mission, Palmview, Penitas, Sullivan City, La Joya, Palmhurst, North McAllen, Los Ebanos and Sharyland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
